=========================

ID: CC6NNOO_00
From: Belal Farag <Belal.Farag@nascodubai.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: IndividualMedical-Dubai <IndividualMedical-Dubai@nascodubai.com>; Diana Haydar <Diana.Haydar@nascodubai.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-01-22 12:16
Subject: Renewal Reminder - SHEILA LANUZA REAL - Policy # - P/01/1306/2018/11725/6 - Policy Expiry - 21/02/2025
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Sir/Madam,  

Greetings from NASCO!

We would like to draw to your attention that the captioned member policy insured thru ORIENT INSURANCE is due for renewal on 22/02/2025

Kindly find below the renewal details inclusive of the below:

1.	Table of Benefits (attached) 
2.	Policy Wording
3.	Renewal Rate as follows:

Insured Member

Plan Type

Policy Number

Total Premium

SHEILA LANUZA REAL

EMed

P/01/1306/2018/11725/6

AED 725

4.	Updated network list   - Nextcare PCP for Out-patient / RN3 for In-patient
5.	LUMI Mobile App 

Note: The above rates are subject to the receipt of the updated Labour Contract. If the salary indicated is above 4000, the renewal will be based on the new category and will be subject to new revise rate based on the member existing medical history.

metadata.doc_id: CC6NNOO - renewal reminder - sheila lanuza real - policy # - p 01 1306 2018 11725 6 - policy expiry\Conversation.txt
metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\CC6NNOO - renewal reminder - sheila lanuza real - policy # - p 01 1306 2018 11725 6 - policy expiry\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
If the salary indicated is above 4000, the renewal will be based on the new category and will be subject to new revise rate based on the member existing medical history.

Kindly note of the following terms:                     

	a.	Network is restricted to out-patient clinics only and Hospitals are restricted to in-patient and hospitalization access.
	b.	Any non-disclosure, misrepresentation or concealment of material fact will make this policy void with immediate effect without any entitlement for refund
	c.	Access to the outside network provided is not allowed and will not be reimburse.
	d.	This is a card-less policy hence no physical cards will be provided. Policies are linked to the member’s registered Emirates ID

 

To process the renewal, we will be requiring the following documents:

 

1.	Copy of Passport, Visa & Emirates ID for Sponsor and Member
2.	Copy of the latest Labor Contract

	a.	This product is entitled for Low Salary Band employees (with monthly up to AED 4,000).Supporting documents will be required to verify eligibility criteria; salary certificate, bank statement or equivalent.
		The Company has the right to audit the policy retrospectively, non-complaint policies will be considered void.

3.	Copy of the Trade License ( if sponsored under company)


We highly encourage you to renew your current policy on or before the expiry date of the current policy. Failure or a delay in renewal can lead to loss of continuous health insurance coverage. If the insurer receives the renewal confirmation after the renewal date, it will be treated as New application which will be subject to medical underwriting and premium may vary.

metadata.doc_id: CC6NNOO - renewal reminder - sheila lanuza real - policy # - p 01 1306 2018 11725 6 - policy expiry\Conversation.txt
metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\CC6NNOO - renewal reminder - sheila lanuza real - policy # - p 01 1306 2018 11725 6 - policy expiry\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
If the insurer receives the renewal confirmation after the renewal date, it will be treated as New application which will be subject to medical underwriting and premium may vary. Furthermore, we wish to remind you that under the relevant health insurance regulations in Abu Dhabi and Dubai, every resident is required to have continuous health insurance coverage throughout the term of their residency or employment. Please be aware that under the relevant laws and regulations, a delay in the renewal of the insurance policy may result in a fine being levied on you by the relevant government authority.

If you have any questions, feedback, or if there's anything specific you would like to discuss regarding your healthcare coverage, please feel free to reach out to us. 

We value your continued trust, and we look forward to serving you in the coming year.

 

 

Belal Farag

 

Senior Client Relationship Executive – Individual Lines





Nasco Middle East
P.O. Box 62528, Dubai, UAE
T +971 4 351 4292  F +971 4 351 4291  D +971 4 305 1627

E Belal.Farag@nascodubai.com <mailto:Belal.Farag@nascodubai.com>

LUMI Mobile App 
Note: The above rates are subject to the receipt of the updated Labour Contract. If the salary indicated is above 4000, the renewal will be based on the new category and will be subject to new revise rate based on the member existing medical history.
Kindly note of the following terms:                     
	a.	Network is restricted to out-patient clinics only and Hospitals are restricted to in-patient and hospitalization access.
	b.	Any non-disclosure, misrepresentation or concealment of material fact will make this policy void with immediate effect without any entitlement for refund
	c.	Access to the outside network provided is not allowed and will not be reimburse.
	d.	This is a card-less policy hence no physical cards will be provided. Policies are linked to the member’s registered Emirates ID
 
To process the renewal, we will be requiring the following documents:
 
1.	Copy of Passport, Visa & Emirates ID for Sponsor and Member
2.	Copy of the latest Labor Contract
	a.	This product is entitled for Low Salary Band employees (with monthly up to AED 4,000).Supporting documents will be required to verify eligibility criteria; salary certificate, bank statement or equivalent.
		The Company has the right to audit the policy retrospectively, non-complaint policies will be considered void.
3.	Copy of the Trade License ( if sponsored under company)

We highly encourage you to renew your current policy on or before the expiry date of the current policy. Failure or a delay in renewal can lead to loss of continuous health insurance coverage. If the insurer receives the renewal confirmation after the renewal date, it will be treated as New application which will be subject to medical underwriting and premium may vary.
